name: Solaris
overview:
Brought to you by retroUSB, Solaris is new space shooter will keep you glued to your seat for hours of exciting space combat action.

Pinned down in your sector, the rest of your team is already lost to the swarm and there is nowhere hide. What do you do? Fight through wave after wave, trying to survive against the endless swarm of alien enemies relentlessly coming after you in increasingly complicated attack patterns. There is no end in sight, how long can you last?

Don't miss the power-up boxes left behind by your team, they may contain invincibility or even a weapon upgrade for maximum damage output. The aliens won’t know what hit 'em!
